languages.text: "Мон-кай, раскрывающий пути... нелепо. Мон-кай несут боль и раздор — и в наши дни, и во веки веков. Как можешь ты доверять мон-кай после того, что поведали тебе мы? После того, как ты услышала скорбную песню гибнущего мира?" {n}Муаран поворачивает голову к вам.{/n} "Крударах пал не по воле случая. Мон-кай разрушили наш древний дом. Лишили нас защиты. Обрекли на скитания среди холодных звезд".

traits.locale_text: "Мон-кай, раскрывающий пути... нелепо. Мон-кай несут боль и раздор — и в наши дни, и во веки веков. Как можешь ты доверять мон-кай после того, что поведали тебе мы? После того, как ты услышала скорбную песню гибнущего мира?" {n}Муаран поворачивает голову к вам.{/n} "Крударах пал не по воле случая. Мон-кай разрушили наш древний дом. Лишили нас защиты. Обрекли на скитания среди холодных звезд".

languages.text: "Mon-keigh revealing paths... it's ludicrous. Mon-keigh bring pain and strife — in our time, and for all time. How can you trust a mon-keigh after what we taught you? After hearing the sorrowful song of the dying world?" {n}Muaran turns his head toward you.{/n} "It was not chance that brought Crudarach down. Mon-keigh destroyed our ancient home. Stripped us of our defences. Doomed us to wander amidst the cold stars."

languages.text: “猴子会揭示道途……这太荒谬了。猴子只会带来痛苦与纷争，无论是在我们的时代，还是其他一切时代。我们教导了你那么多知识，你也听到了那些垂死世界的哀鸣，你怎么还能相信猴子？”{n}穆兰把头转向你。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫的陷落并非偶然。猴子摧毁了我们古老的家园，剥夺了我们的自卫能力。我们注定要在寒冷的星空中流浪。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh revealing paths... it's ludicrous. Mon-keigh bring pain and strife — in our time, and for all time. How can you trust a mon-keigh after what we taught you? After hearing the sorrowful song of the dying world?" {n}Muaran turns his head toward you.{/n} "It was not chance that brought Crudarach down. Mon-keigh destroyed our ancient home. Stripped us of our defences. Doomed us to wander amidst the cold stars."

traits.locale_text: “猴子会揭示道途……这太荒谬了。猴子只会带来痛苦与纷争，无论是在我们的时代，还是其他一切时代。我们教导了你那么多知识，你也听到了那些垂死世界的哀鸣，你怎么还能相信猴子？”{n}穆兰把头转向你。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫的陷落并非偶然。猴子摧毁了我们古老的家园，剥夺了我们的自卫能力。我们注定要在寒冷的星空中流浪。”

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイが示す道だと…愚かな。モン＝ケイは苦痛と争いをもたらすものだ。今現在も、いつの世でも。我らの教えを受けてなお、どうしてモン＝ケイを信じられる？死にゆく星の悲痛な歌を聴いただろう？」{n}ムアランがこちらに向き直る。{/n}「クルダラが落ちたのは偶然ではなかった。モン＝ケイは我らの旧き家を破壊した。我らの防備を剥ぎ取った。冷たい星々をさまよう運命に我らを縛り付けたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh revealing paths... it's ludicrous. Mon-keigh bring pain and strife — in our time, and for all time. How can you trust a mon-keigh after what we taught you? After hearing the sorrowful song of the dying world?" {n}Muaran turns his head toward you.{/n} "It was not chance that brought Crudarach down. Mon-keigh destroyed our ancient home. Stripped us of our defences. Doomed us to wander amidst the cold stars."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイが示す道だと…愚かな。モン＝ケイは苦痛と争いをもたらすものだ。今現在も、いつの世でも。我らの教えを受けてなお、どうしてモン＝ケイを信じられる？死にゆく星の悲痛な歌を聴いただろう？」{n}ムアランがこちらに向き直る。{/n}「クルダラが落ちたのは偶然ではなかった。モン＝ケイは我らの旧き家を破壊した。我らの防備を剥ぎ取った。冷たい星々をさまよう運命に我らを縛り付けたのだ」

languages.text: "Chem-Pan-Sey, die Pfade enthüllen ... das ist lächerlich. Chem-Pan-Sey bringen Leid und Zwist – in unserer Zeit wie in jeder Zeit. Wie könnt Ihr einem Chem-Pan-Sey vertrauen nach dem, was wir Euch gelehrt haben? Nachdem Ihr das traurige Lied der sterbenden Welt gehört habt?" {n}Muaran dreht seinen Kopf zu dir.{/n} "Nicht Zufall hat Crudarach zu Fall gebracht. Chem-Pan-Sey haben unsere alte Heimat zerstört. Uns jeglicher Verteidigung beraubt. Uns dazu verdammt, unter den kalten Sternen zu wandern."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh revealing paths... it's ludicrous. Mon-keigh bring pain and strife — in our time, and for all time. How can you trust a mon-keigh after what we taught you? After hearing the sorrowful song of the dying world?" {n}Muaran turns his head toward you.{/n} "It was not chance that brought Crudarach down. Mon-keigh destroyed our ancient home. Stripped us of our defences. Doomed us to wander amidst the cold stars."

Wie könnt Ihr einem Chem-Pan-Sey vertrauen nach dem, was wir Euch gelehrt haben? Nachdem Ihr das traurige Lied der sterbenden Welt gehört habt?" {n}Muaran dreht seinen Kopf zu dir.{/n} "Nicht Zufall hat Crudarach zu Fall gebracht. Chem-Pan-Sey haben unsere alte Heimat zerstört. Uns jeglicher Verteidigung beraubt. Uns dazu verdammt, unter den kalten Sternen zu wandern."

languages.text: « Comme si les mon-keigh pouvaient révéler les voies... Ne soyez pas ridicule. Ils n'ont jamais été qu'une source de souffrance et de conflit, et cela ne changera jamais. Comment pouvez-vous faire confiance à l'{mf|un|une} d'eux après ce que nous vous avons appris ? Après avoir entendu le chant affligé du monde mourant ? » {n}Muaran tourne la tête vers vous.{/n} « La destruction de Crudarach n'est pas due au hasard. Ce sont les mon-keigh qui ont anéanti notre foyer ancestral, qui nous ont laissés sans défense et condamnés à errer dans le froid glacial parmi les étoiles. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh revealing paths... it's ludicrous. Mon-keigh bring pain and strife — in our time, and for all time. How can you trust a mon-keigh after what we taught you? After hearing the sorrowful song of the dying world?" {n}Muaran turns his head toward you.{/n} "It was not chance that brought Crudarach down. Mon-keigh destroyed our ancient home. Stripped us of our defences. Doomed us to wander amidst the cold stars."

traits.locale_text: « Comme si les mon-keigh pouvaient révéler les voies... Ne soyez pas ridicule. Ils n'ont jamais été qu'une source de souffrance et de conflit, et cela ne changera jamais. Comment pouvez-vous faire confiance à l'{mf|un|une} d'eux après ce que nous vous avons appris ? Après avoir entendu le chant affligé du monde mourant ? » {n}Muaran tourne la tête vers vous.{/n} « La destruction de Crudarach n'est pas due au hasard. Ce sont les mon-keigh qui ont anéanti notre foyer ancestral, qui nous ont laissés sans défense et condamnés à errer dans le froid glacial parmi les étoiles. »

languages.text: «Mon-keigh revelando sendas... Ridículo. Los mon-keigh no traen más que dolor y sufrimiento, ahora y siempre. ¿Cómo puedes confiar en un{mf||a} mon-keigh después de todo lo que te hemos enseñado? ¿Después de oír la desgarradora canción de este mundo moribundo?». {n}Muaran gira la cabeza en tu dirección.{/n} «No fue una mera casualidad lo que acabó con Crudarach. Los mon-keigh destruyeron nuestro hogar ancestral. Nos arrebataron nuestras defensas. Nos condenaron a vagar entre las gélidas estrellas».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh revealing paths... it's ludicrous. Mon-keigh bring pain and strife — in our time, and for all time. How can you trust a mon-keigh after what we taught you? After hearing the sorrowful song of the dying world?" {n}Muaran turns his head toward you.{/n} "It was not chance that brought Crudarach down. Mon-keigh destroyed our ancient home. Stripped us of our defences. Doomed us to wander amidst the cold stars."

Los mon-keigh no traen más que dolor y sufrimiento, ahora y siempre. ¿Cómo puedes confiar en un{mf||a} mon-keigh después de todo lo que te hemos enseñado? ¿Después de oír la desgarradora canción de este mundo moribundo?». {n}Muaran gira la cabeza en tu dirección.{/n} «No fue una mera casualidad lo que acabó con Crudarach. Los mon-keigh destruyeron nuestro hogar ancestral. Nos arrebataron nuestras defensas. Nos condenaron a vagar entre las gélidas estrellas».

languages.text: "Mon-keigh yol göstermişmiş... Saçmalığa bak. Mon-keigh dediğin azap çektirir, kavga çıkarır. Daima böyledir bu, şimdi de böyle. Sana öğrettiklerimizden sonra mon-keighlerden birine nasıl güvenebilirsin? Hele bir de can çekişen dünyamızın elem şarkısını işittikten sonra?" {n}Muaran, başını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Crudarach talihsizlikten yıkılmadı. Mon-keighler kadim yurdumuzu yok etti. Bizi kendimizi savunmaktan mahrum bıraktılar. Soğuk yıldızlar arasında amaçsızca dolaşmaya mahkûm ettiler."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh revealing paths... it's ludicrous. Mon-keigh bring pain and strife — in our time, and for all time. How can you trust a mon-keigh after what we taught you?
